description:
The Finance Operations team manages Google's cash transactions on a global basis and ensures that Google's incoming and outgoing cash processes are controlled, effective and efficient. As a member of this team, you'll find innovative ways to manage our complex set of transactions. You thrive on making processes more efficient and scalable, you work to ensure the highest level of quality of our operations and you proactively minimize operational risk. Externally, you collaborate with our outsourcing partners and internally, you collaborate across the five areas of the Financial Operations team: Global Revenue Operations, Procure to Pay, Electronic Payment Services, Business Process Outsourcing, and Payroll.

As a Process and Quality Analyst, you create scalable processes and make them better. You are the link for the core Finance team and the teams across Google, responsible for forecasting, planning, resource prioritization and business profitability.

The Identity Verifications Operations team, within Finance Operations, helps keep our payments ecosystem safe and secure by ensuring that our Payments verify the identity of our customers.

As a Process and Quality Analyst, you will have the opportunity to expand our IDV Operations to cover more Google products and customers. You will collaborate with our external outsourcing vendors to empower them to effectively run the operations and meet goals. You will partner across Product Management, Engineering, Legal, and other operations teams to continuously implement process improvements as the operations grow. Additionally, you will make processes more efficient and scalable, working to ensure the highest level of quality for our operations and proactively minimizing operational risk. You are detailed-oriented and see to it that as Google pursues our next big idea, we always have our bases covered.

The name Google came from "googol," a mathematical term for the number 1 followed by 100 zeros. And nobody at Google loves big numbers like the Finance team when providing in depth analysis on all manner of strategic decisions across Google products. From developing forward-thinking analysis to generating management reports to scaling our automated financial processes, the Finance organization is an important partner and advisor to the business.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Business or Operations or equivalent practical experience.
  • 3 years of relevant work experience in financial technology, financial services, payments, consulting, risk/fraud, or compliance operations.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience in fraud and/or identity verification operations.
  • Experience working in a cross-functional, fast-paced environment and contributing to complex operations initiatives.
  • Ability to work collaboratively with vendors and international teams.
  • Ability to deliver independently and prioritize multiple initiatives.
  • Passion for analyzing large data sets, formulating recommendations, and communicating them clearly. Excellent spreadsheet and/or SQL skills.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
responsibilities:
• Design new workflows to support product launches and testing.
  • Document new processes and systems to ensure that they are working as intended.
  • Identify and document end-to-end operational process design, perform analyses to drive effective process improvements, troubleshoot quickly, and provide solutions to mitigate and/or prevent future issues.
  • Conduct periodic quality reviews to ensure that operations meet high-quality standards.
  • Collaborate with teammates and cross-functional partners to ensure successful operational launches, including handling relevant escalations.
title: Process and Quality Analyst, Identity Verification Operations
